attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the first ethical principle is "above all else do no harm to others", therefore, the petitioner is urging the P.M. to look at the management of critical incidents, powers of arrest and serach so no more injuries occur. Admittedly, the police may be doing their utmost to police the streets, maintain peaceful communities and promote law and order, but individual officers need to be better trained in how to do this without causing injury.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
